Package xbeerelay

Class Summary
PowerPlotter This class is used for plotting the simulated house's power consumption.
Relay This represents a relay.
RelayManager This is the base class for all relay-managing classes.
XbeeManager This is the class that interacts with the Xbee chips.
XbeeRelayManager This class is used for actually managing our relays remotely using the Xbee chips and Xbee API.
XbeeRelayManagerTest This is basically just a simple test program to play with the rest of this relay management API.
XbeeSWTGui This is the main class for the PC side.
 

Enum Summary
Relay.RelayStatus Represents the status of a relay.
Relay.XbeeDigitalIOPin Represents the Xbee digital IO pin that is used to monitor the status of this relay.
 

Exception Summary
RelayException Thrown if there's a problem with a relay.
